title: DAISIE 4.5.0
text: CRAN release: 2025-02-05 Fix bugs likelihood calculation IW model Fix bug loglikelihood calculation high lambda Update documentation New DAISIE FAQ vignette

title: DAISIE 4.4.1
text: CRAN release: 2023-10-21 Fix bug calculation shift loglikelihoods. Fix bug parameters optimized incorrectly Inf #159 #160 (@joshwlambert). DAISIE_SR_loglik_CS_M1() now DAISIE_loglik_CS_shift(). New pkgdown website. Several improvements relaxed rate code.

title: DAISIE 4.4.0
text: CRAN release: 2023-04-02 longer include patched version boost/numeric/odeint/stepper/bulirsch_stoer.hpp, address issue passing previously uninitialised variable boost::units::quantity<boost::units::si::dimensionless, double>. Document return type exported Rcpp functions. Move internal non-error printing console message() warning(). Add internal functions address . verbose variable now numeric, varying 0 3. Increasing values increase amount messages printed. Change default printing output golden rule silence verbose == 0. print , set verbose >= 1. Remove calls options(warn = -1) suppress warnings non standard way. Use suppressWarnings() appropriate. Safely restore graphics settings plot. Fix references DESCRIPTION. Remove internal (unnecessary) calls internal functions via :::. longer use roxygen2 tag internal document without index use noRd instead. are_area_pars() now internal. Replace \dontrun examples documentation \donttest. Speed examples. License package C++ source files BSL-1.0 (c) Hanno Hildenbrandt, FORTRAN files BSL-1.0 (c) Rampal S. Etienne. Add LICENSE.note, inst/COPYRIGHTS clarify license copyrights. Pipe files DESCRIPTION.

title: DAISIE 4.3.4
text: Require C++17 via CXX_STD flag Makevars[.win]. Add SystemRequirements: C++17 DESCRIPTION standard “Writing R Extensions” requires explicitly stated. Depends R (>= 4.2.0) due C++17 requirement Windows due Rtools 4.0, used R 4.0-4.1. Toolchain Rtools 4.0 gcc 8.3 “GCC 9.1 first release non-experimental C++17 support”. per https://gcc.gnu.org/.

title: DAISIE 4.3.3
text: Patched version boost/numeric/odeint/stepper/bulirsch_stoer.hpp. done including patched header file src/patched_bulrisch_stoer.h boost/numeric/odeint shadow boost/numeric/odeint/stepper/bulrisch_stoer.hpp issue fixed BOOST_VERSION == 1.81.0. Must check fixes upcomming boost (BH) releases. Fix tab spacing src/DAISIE_loglik_rhs_FORTRAN.f95. Re-implement clang16 -D_HAS_AUTO_PTR_ETC flag fix via Makevars[.win] comply CRAN requests force C++ standard C++14 without using SystemRequirements line DESCRIPTION, CRAN’s request. Skip plotting tests cause problems headless systems. run manually. Skip tests --now experimental steppers ODEINT rosenbrock4 adams bashfort moulton 1 slow.

title: DAISIE 4.3.2
text: Add config.h macro, checking , setting, _HAS_AUTO_PTR_ETC BOOST_NO_AUTO_PTR. Change SystemRequirements DESCRIPTION C++17 C++14. fix applied package 'DDD' version 5.2.1.

title: DAISIE 4.3.1
text: CRAN release: 2023-02-13 Fix issue prevented ‘covr’ running correctly. Depend R >= 4.1.0, C++17. Tests DAISIE_ML_*() integration tests don’t run CRAN due long runtime.

title: DAISIE 4.3.0
text: Due recent changes CRAN policy result warnings due use Rcpp related packages link libraries use sprintf (‘Rcpp’ ‘BH’), ‘DAISIE’ now requires Rcpp v(>= 1.0.10) BH v(>= 1.81.0-1). See https://github.com/RcppCore/Rcpp/pull/1236 https://github.com/eddelbuettel/bh/pull/90 respectively. Also require package ‘DDD’ v(>= 5.0.0). Add code trait-dependent simulations considering two carrying capacities trait state. Improvements relaxed rate model fitting procedure. Add DAISIE_count_species() count number species datalist simulated data. Simply printing code wrapping multiple instances print_parameters_and_loglik(). Overall documentation improvements updated references. Bug fix DAISIE_sim_cr_iw(), wrongly computed number species present. #147 Improve likelihood calculation. Fixed incorrect likelihood present type 2 case CS model inference values lambda high, C++ implementation. Overhaul GHA workflows date conservative run. Feature branches require tag [run ci] added commit message run.

title: DAISIE 4.2.1
text: Bug fixes DAISIE_loglik_CS()likelihood code continental sampling (probability initial presence island). Bug fix DAISIE_sim_cr_iw() replication works correctly.

title: DAISIE 4.2.0
text: CRAN release: 2022-06-02 divergence time unknown known occurred specific point time island’s existence. divergence time unknown known occurred specific point time island’s existence (usually known dated population level phylogenetic data available). Improve finalise continental island estimation scenario, initially species present island inception. Improve tests related two points . Remove DAISIE time dependent estimation code now ease work remaining code. Development proceed separately. Rate computations simulation first calculated per lineage, calculated per island. needed time dependent estimation later . Improve zenodo metadata. Add methode = "odeint::adams_bashforth_moulton_X" list available numeric integrators parameter estimation.

title: DAISIE 4.1.1
text: Correctly use .data.frame() rather class(foo) == "data.frame" satisfy CRAN note.

title: DAISIE 4.1.0
text: Produces full stt tables. Can run conditioning number surviving species present. Added DAISIE_CS_max_steps() manually change maximum number integration steps CS C++ integrators. Renamed reworked simulation architecture. Renamed totaltime total_time. Integrators package 'deSolve' reinstated default ODE solvers. Added stac_key vignette detailing possible statuses colonist lineages. Use LazyData.

title: DAISIE 4.0.5
text: N.B.: MacOS users may experience issues installing DAISIE, especially MacOS Big Sur. case, please see detailed installation instructions. "odeint::runge_kutta_cash_karp54" "odeint::runge_kutta_fehlberg78" [default] "odeint::runge_kutta_dopri5" "odeint::bulirsch_stoer" without odeint::-prefix, deSolve::ode method assumed. deSolve::ode using "lsodes" still default, . Make sure CS_version = 0 (default) use C++ ODEINT numerical integration. * Better handling number threads use DAISIE_IW_num_threads() ML estimation IW model threads available. * Fixes numerical instability conditional probability calculation IW model probability extinction close 1. * Introduce approximation log conditional likelihood computed add message triggered.

title: DAISIE 4.0.2
text: N.B.: MacOS users may experience issues installing DAISIE, especially MacOS Big Sur. case, please see detailed installation instructions. Suggest ggtree >= 3.0.0.

title: DAISIE 4.0.1
text: N.B.: MacOS users may experience issues installing DAISIE, especially MacOS Big Sur. case, please see detailed installation instructions. Fix possibility fitting CS model IW likelihood simulated data setting CS_version = 0. Improve CS_version documentation.

title: DAISIE 4.0.0
text: N.B.: MacOS users may experience issues installing DAISIE, especially MacOS Big Sur. case, please see detailed installation instructions. Fix bug calculating conditional probabilities, now correctly calculated island age present. Fix bug calculating probabilities upon migration, assumed recolonisation possible CS model. Handling recolonisation manner possible IW model, approximation now made. influence bug approximation IW model expected minimal, particularly cases colonisation rate low. cases low colonisation norm. Add num_cycles argument ML functions, allowing specify many cycles optimizer take. Defaults 1. Minor vignette corrections. Improve README.md documentation.

title: DAISIE 3.2.1
text: N.B.: MacOS users may experience issues installing DAISIE, especially MacOS Big Sur. case, please see detailed installation instructions. Minor documentation improvements.

title: DAISIE 3.2.0
text: N.B.: MacOS users may experience issues installing DAISIE, especially MacOS Big Sur. case, please see detailed installation instructions. DAISIE_loglikg_IW() now efficient numerically stable. Numerical integration now done via C++ package odeint. Add relaxed rate capabilities (inference simulations). Relaxed rate models allow parameters static, sampled specific probability distributions. Introduce MinAge data status DAISIE data objects. status containing MinAge sets lower boundary colonization situations precise colonization time unknown. interpreted DAISIE_dataprep() information passed likelihood optimization functions. See DAISIE_dataprep() help page details. back-end results new stac values 8 9. Bug fix “bug 2” bug report manuscript. bug present DAISIE_ONEcolonist() recolonization occurs. now fixed colonization branching times stored way now think best dealt likelihood code. recolonization cases, $other_clades_same_ancestor renamed $all_colonisations. #125 Fix bug occurs rarely, computing log conditional probabilities. applicable ML code running cond. Removed deprecated legacy functions. Removed functions named DAISIE_*_VERSION_NUMBER() DAISIE_calc_*_rate() funcions get_brts_mya(). #126 Made functions internal, . DAISIE_make_global() create_island() now internal. #127 @HHildenbrandt now author. Added @xieshu95’s @joshwlambert’s ORCIDs. Added NEWS.md file track changes package.

title: DAISIE 3.1.0
text: Expands possibility conditioning simulations MLE CS model number colonizing lineages. simulation ML functions, cond argument can now greater one. non-zero cond signifies ML simulation conditioned least cond colonizations island. Implements #121, sim ML level. Add BugReports, Website missing ORCID DESCRIPTION.

title: DAISIE 3.0.1
text: CRAN release: 2020-08-26 Correct @joshwlambert’s name DESCRIPTION. DAISIE_sim_relaxed_rate() input closer DAISIE_ML() input. Documentation improvements. Tweak Makevars.

title: DAISIE 3.0.0
text: CRAN release: 2020-08-14 Major revamp simulation code. Simulations now accessed using DAISIE_sim_*() syntax. Constant rate, time-dependent, trait-dependent, (multiple) split-rate available. Relaxed-rate inference available DAISIE_ML_CS(). Improved vignettes documenting CS IW cases. Full stt can returned setting sample_freq = Inf DAISIE_sim_*() functions. Optional plotting DAISIE_plot_input(). (Requires additional dependencies). Back-end architecture improvements.

title: DAISIE 2.0.1
text: Minor update v2.0: empty islands simulated output list contains one element instead two (second indicated stac = 0, .e. surviving colonization).

title: DAISIE 2.0
